      Methods in server with parameters of type ServerGame 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Server.broadcastEndgame(ServerGame game, ClientHandler clientHandler)
      Calls the EndGame method for all game handlers with the reason of the end game.
      void Server.broadcastSuccesfulMoveResult(int i, ServerGame game, ClientHandler clientHandler)
      Calls method for all client handlers to send a move result and checks if the game is over after this move.

      Sets the server game.
